resources.string: HealthBuddy, Your Personal Health Companion!\n\nAn app designed especially to empower you to take control of your health and well-being.
We offers a comprehensive food diary and nutritional information, helping you make healthier food choices and achieve your dietary objectives!
Access a range of guided meditations, stress-relief exercises, and wellness articles to improve your mental well-being and promote a balanced lifestyle!
Connect with like-minded individuals in the HealthBuddy community, sharing experiences, tips, and encouragement on your health journey!
By tapping Continue with Google, you agree to HealthBuddyâ€™s Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.

Please read these Terms and Conditions ("Terms") carefully before using the HealthBuddy mobile application ("App") operated by [Your Company Name] ("us," "we," or "our").

By accessing or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the Terms, do not use the App.

Use of the App:

  1. User Account: To use certain features of the App, you may be required to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and password.
  2. User-generated Content: HealthBuddy allows you to input and share health and fitness-related information, including nutrition and exercise data. You are solely responsible for the accuracy and legality of the content you upload or share.
  3. Prohibited Activities: You agree not to engage in any activities that may compromise the security or integrity of the App, including hacking, reverse engineering, or distributing harmful code.

Intellectual Property:

  1. App Content: All content within the App, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is owned by us or our licensors and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
  2. User Content: You retain ownership of the content you upload or share within the App. By providing user-generated content, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute that content within the App.
  3. Prohibited Activities: You agree not to engage in any activities that may compromise the security or integrity of the App, including hacking, reverse engineering, or distributing harmful code.

Privacy:
Your use of the App is also governed by our Privacy Policy. By using the App, you consent to the practices outlined in the Privacy Policy.

Disclaimer:
The App is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied. We do not warrant that the App will be error-free or that access to the App will be uninterrupted.

Limitation of Liability:
To the extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, consequential, special, or incidental damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the App.

Governing Law:
These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Country], without regard to its conflict of law principles.

Changes to Terms:
We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. By continuing to use the App after changes to the Terms have been posted, you agree to be bound by the updated Terms.

This Privacy Policy explains how HealthBuddy ("we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, shares, and protects user information when you use the HealthBuddy mobile application ("App"). By using the App, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

Information We Collect:

  1. Personal Information: When you sign up for an account, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and profile picture. This information is used to create and personalize your account.
  2. Health and Exercise Data: The primary purpose of HealthBuddy is to track your nutrition and exercise activities. We collect data related to the foods you log, exercises you perform, and any notes you add. This data is used to provide insights and recommendations for your health and fitness goals.
  3. User Communications: HealthBuddy enables users to communicate with each other. We may collect and store these communications to facilitate interactions between users.
  4. User Communications: HealthBuddy enables users to communicate with each other. We may collect and store these communications to facilitate interactions between users.

How We Use Your Information:

  1. Personalization: We use the information you provide to personalize your experience within the App, including tailoring recommendations and insights based on your health and fitness data.
  2. Communication: We may use your email address to send you important notifications about your account, updates to our services, and other relevant information.
  3. Analytics: We may analyze user data in an aggregated and anonymized form to improve the App's functionality, enhance user experience, and understand usage patterns.

Sharing of Information:

  1. User Communication: HealthBuddy enables users to communicate with each other. Please be aware that any information shared in these communications may be visible to other users.
  2. Authorized Third Parties: We may share your information with third-party service providers who help us with app hosting, data storage, and analytics. These providers are contractually obligated to protect your information and use it only for the purposes specified.

Data Security:
We take data security seriously and have implemented reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

Your Choices:
You can update or delete your account information and data within the App. If you choose to delete your account, please note that certain data may be retained for backup, legal, or legitimate business purposes.

Children's Privacy:
HealthBuddy is intended for users who are 18 years of age or older. We do not knowingly collect personal information from individuals under 18. If you become aware that a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so we can take appropriate action.

Changes to this Policy:
We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes to our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will provide notice of any material changes, and you should review the policy periodically.

Contact Us:
If you have any questions, concerns, or requests related to your privacy and the HealthBuddy App, please contact us at healthbuddy@gmail.com
